thread.title: Bangla Trac Communications Selects Dialogic for International Gateway Deployment
thread.title_full: Bangla Trac Communications Selects Dialogic for International Gateway Deployment - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bangla Trac Communications Selects Dialogic for International Gateway Deployment
text:
International gateway service provider for Bangladesh replaces legacy Ericsson switching with Dialogic Intelligent Call Control solutions
Parsippany, NJ
Dialogic , a global networking software and infrastructure solution provider, today announced that Bangla Trac Communications , a leading provider of premium quality international voice termination services in Bangladesh, has chosen Dialogic to modernize and expand its IP voice network. The Dialogic® solution is to provide a highly-scalable IP interconnect platform, and to support advanced flexible routing capabilities that safeguard business continuity for the millions of minutes of traffic carried over the Bangla Trac network every day.
As an international gateway and interconnect service provider, Bangla Trac focuses on providing customers with a highly robust network supporting premium quality voice terminations. As a result of its commitment to quality and reliability, Bangla Trac has virtually doubled the capacity of its network since the beginning of 2015.
“We selected Dialogic for our international gateway because we wanted a solution from a single vendor that would allow us to evolve our business and deliver new flexible routing capabilities to our customers,” commented Md. Zainal Abedin, Director and CIO at Bangla Trac Communications. “We are witnessing growth in market demand for our premium wholesale services, and Dialogic provides an economically scalable solution with significantly lower power consumption and higher capacity than our current equipment.”
Bangla Trac will deploy a state-of-the-art solution consisting of the Dialogic’s ControlSwitch System , I-Gate® 4000 Media Gateways , and BorderNet 4000 Session Border Controllers that provide integrated support for both TDM and VoIP interconnect services.
“Bangla Trac is focused on providing a highly scalable and robust network for its growing list of tier 1 and tier 2 carrier customers globally,” noted Jim Machi, Senior VP of Product Management and Marketing at Dialogic. “We are pleased that they have chosen the Dialogic Intelligent Call Control solutions to handle millions-of-minutes-a-day of both TDM and IP voice traffic, and we are eager to help them continue to innovate in order to achieve their business goals."
About Bangla Trac Communications
Bangla Trac Communications limited is a premium telecom service provider driven by innovation and commitment to quality. As one of the pioneer International Gateway (IGW) Service Providers, we have diversified our portfolio well beyond our core business of premium quality voice termination to Bangladesh. Our wide range of innovative products and services are designed to enable our local and international partners to realize their full potential in target markets.
About Dialogic
Dialogic, a global networking software and infrastructure solution provider, inspires the world’s leading service providers and application developers to elevate the performance of media-rich communications across the most advanced networks. 48 of the world’s top 50 mobile operators and nearly 3,000 application developers rely on Dialogic to redefine the possible and exceed user expectations.
Dialogic, I-Gate, ControlSwitch, and BorderNet are either registered trademarks or trademarks of Dialogic Corporation or a subsidiary thereof (“Dialogic”). Other trademarks mentioned and/or marked herein belong to their respective owners.
